Name: Target iframe in console
Description: Can I target iframes while debugging from the Console panel?
Author: @pankajparashar

Notes: 2. Click the "top" menu, and select the iframe to target in the **Console**.

Firefox.Notes:
1. In the **Console** tab, click the "iframe context picker button" (top right) to launch a popup listing all the iframes in the document (and the main document itself). 
2. Select an entry to make it the target iframe. Note that the button is only displayed if the page includes iframes!

Notes: 2. Click the "top" menu, and select the iframe to target in the **Console**.

Safari.Notes: 1. In the **Console** panel, select the target iframe from the "Execution context for $0" dropdown (bottom-right).

Notes: 2. Click the "top" menu, and select the iframe to target in the **Console**.
